Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Erie County NY legislator Joe Lorigo: “renege on the $5mm AK360 pledge; infrastructure is more important”. Uh, AK360 is infrastructure, man!
clean_text: ERIE COUNTY NY LEGISLATOR JOE LORIGO RENEGE 5MM AK360 PLEDGE INFRASTRUCTURE IMPORTANT” UH AK360 INFRASTRUCTURE

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: The outcome AK360 hopes to achieve would reap economic benefits to Buffalo and Erie County far exceeding the public funds so wisely pledged.
clean_text: OUTCOME AK360 HOPES ACHIEVE REAP ECONOMIC BENEFITS BUFFALO ERIE COUNTY EXCEEDING PUBLIC FUNDS WISELY PLEDGED
